definitions.definition: A finely cut gemstone, especially a diamond, cut in a particular form with numerous facets so as to maximize light return through the top (called "table") of the stone.
The size of type between excelsior and diamond, standardized as 4-point.
Most hummingbird species of the genus Heliodoxa.
A kind of cotton goods, figured on the weaving.

definitions.example: the brilliant lights along the promenade

definitions.definition: (of a colour) Both bright and saturated.
(of a voice or sound) Having a sharp, clear tone

definitions.example: The actor's performance in the play was simply brilliant.
